name: jitsi-meet
description: Jitsi Meet is a WebRTC based video conferencing platform that can be self hosted. It supports multi party meetings, screen sharing, chat and recording, all accessible from a browser or mobile apps without requiring user accounts.

features.title: Video Meetings
features.description: Multi-party video calls, HD quality, Browser-based. No downloads or accounts required

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Share your screen, Presentation mode, Collaborative viewing. Present to your team seamlessly

features.title: Meeting Features
features.description: Text chat, Recording, Virtual backgrounds. Full-featured conferencing platform

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: End-to-end encryption, Private infrastructure, GDPR compliant. Control your meeting data
